summary: Kevin Was Having A Drink Or 2, When He Saw The Dragonborn Walk In And Remembered All The Good Times They Had On Top 5 Skyrim Mods, And Knew To Help Him In All Manors. You, The Dragonborn , Rememvered Those Times Too! (You Should If You Download This Mod!) And Know He Will Be Good For An Adventure!
descriptionHtml:
Kevin Was Having A Drink Or 2, When He Saw The Dragonborn Walk In And Remembered All The Good Times They Had On Top 5 Skyrim Mods, And Knew To Help Him In All Manors. You, The Dragonborn , Rememvered Those Times Too! (You Should If You [url=#]Download[img]http://startsavin-a.akamaihd.net/items/it/img/arrow-10x10.png[/img][/url] This Mod!) And Know He Will Be Good For An Adventure!

This Mod Isn't Very Lore Friendly, But Oh Well! This Is My First Mod So Don't Be A Bia!.... jerk..
I Will Make A Model For His Sword But, For Now It Is What It Is. This Mod Is Very Simple And Works With 95% Of All Versions Of Skyrim. He Is In The Bannered Mare In Whiterun. Please Help Me Show This To Cam And Seb At Top 5 Skyrim Mods On Youtube. Don't Tell Them About The Sword Name.

I Could Not Have Made This Without Kevin VanOrd, Kevin VanLord, Kevin VanNord, Cam (Robinson I Think? Sorry, If That's Wrong) and Seb Ford!
author: TranzitMusical
